content: double_crochet in each st around join 20 double_crochet r3 slip_stitch next 4 sts single_crochet half_double_crochet next st 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 treble_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts half_double_crochet single_crochet in next st slip_stitch last 4 sts 32 sts fasten_off leave tail for sewing head/body/legs r1 chain 4 9 double_crochet in 4th chain join 10 double_crochet r2 chain 3 double_crochet in same st then this is trickier to read than to do so i am breaking this round into bullets and bolding every other step © 2018 liz meehan crafty woman shop https //craftywomanshop wordpress com | https //craftywomanshop etsy com ​ ​ 4 ❏ 2 double_crochet in next st ❏ double_crochet chain 12 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 10 chs slip_stitch to top of double_crochet double_crochet again in same st chain 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 6 chs slip_stitch to top of double_crochet ​ ❏ double_crochet in next st chain 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 6 chs slip_stitch to top of double_crochet double_crochet again in same st ch15 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 13 chs slip_stitch to top of double_crochet ❏ double_crochet in next st double_crochet in same st chain 4 slip_stitch to top of double_crochet ​ ❏ double_crochet in next st chain 4 slip_stitch to top of double_crochet double_crochet again in same st ❏ double_crochet in next st chain 15 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 13 chs slip_stitch to top of double_crochet double_crochet again in same st chain 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 6 chs slip_stitch to top of double_crochet ​ ❏ double_crochet in next st chain 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 6 chs double_crochet again in same st chain 12 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and remaining 10 chs slip_stitch to top of double_crochet ❏ 2 double_crochet in next 2 sts join fasten_off © 2018 liz meehan crafty woman shop https //craftywomanshop wordpress com | https //craftywomanshop etsy com ​ ​ 5 assembly sew the two body pieces of the spider together refer to the pictures for placement using red yarn embroider the hourglass shape if you want your spider to be a black widow attach spider as desired onto web © 2018 liz meehan crafty woman shop https
